function.name: random
function.description: Générateur de nombres aléatoires VRAIS basés sur sources physiques (bruit atmosphérique, décroissance quantique). Idéal pour cryptographie, jeux, sélection aléatoire.

operation.description: Operation: generate_integers (entiers), generate_floats (décimaux), generate_bytes (bytes aléatoires), coin_flip (pile/face), dice_roll (dé), shuffle (mélanger liste), pick_random (choisir dans liste)

count.description: Number of random values to generate (1-10000, default: 1)

unique.description: Ensure all generated integers are unique (no duplicates). Only for generate_integers. Default: false

decimals.description: Number of decimal places for floats (1-20, default: 2). Only for generate_floats.

length.description: Number of bytes to generate (1-1000, default: 16). Only for generate_bytes.

format.description: Output format for bytes: hex, base64, or decimal array. Default: hex

sides.description: Number of sides on the die (3-100, default: 6). Only for dice_roll.

items.description: List of items to shuffle or pick from. Required for shuffle and pick_random operations.

source.description: Random source: auto (fallback logic), atmospheric (RANDOM.ORG), quantum (Cisco QRNG). Default: auto
